Title: Fireproof
Writer: Alex Kendrick (story and screenplay), Stephen Kendrick (story and screenplay)
Actors: Kirk Cameron, Erin Bethea, Ken Bevel, Stephen Dervan
Plot: In Albany, the marriage of Caleb and Catherine Holt is in crisis and they decide to divorce. However, Caleb's father, John, proposes that his son delays their separation process for forty days and follow a procedure called "The Love Dare" to make them love each other again.
